title: 【永續講座】"The adaptive sanitation program in Komodo district, Indonesia" 12/4 Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan 主講
content:
分類： 演講暨研討會
來源： 永續發展中心 - 李敏賢 - jordanlee@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5919
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【永續講座】"The adaptive sanitation program in Komodo district, Indonesia" 12/4 Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan 主講
日期： Mon, 2 Dec 2024 15:27:49 +0800
附檔： The adaptive sanitation program in Komodo district Indonesia.jpg (5 MB)   
主辦：永續發展中心
講題：The adaptive sanitation program in Komodo district, Indonesia
日期：12月4日（星期三）
時間：14：00～17：00
地點：環海院B160教室
主講：Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan, Faculty Member, Faculty of Infrastructure Planning, Universitas Pertamina

Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan 經歷：
Faculty Member, Faculty of Infrastructure Planning, Universitas Pertamina

＊備註：本場專題演以全英文講授


【Sustainable Development Lecture】
Lecture Title: The Adaptive Sanitation Program in Komodo District, Indonesia
Speaker: Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan
Date: December 4th (Wednesday)
Time: 14:00–17:00
Location: Room B160, College of Environmental Studies and Oceanography

Speaker: Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan, Faculty Member, Faculty of Infrastructure Planning, Universitas Pertamina

Speaker’s Bio:
Dr. I Wayan Koko Suryawan is a faculty member at the Faculty of Infrastructure Planning, Universitas Pertamina, with expertise in sustainable infrastructure development and climate change adaptation strategies.

Note: This lecture will be conducted in English.
